code: import React from'react';import Container from'./Container';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Section=_ref=>{let{children,id,className='',containerClassName='',background='white'}=_ref;const backgroundClasses={white:'bg-white','kawai-sand':'bg-gradient-to-br from-kawai-sand to-white','kawai-blue':'bg-gradient-to-br from-kawai-blue/5 to-kawai-sand','kawai-warm':'bg-gradient-to-br from-kawai-warm/5 to-white'};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:id,className:`py-16 ${backgroundClasses[background]} ${className}`,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{className:containerClassName,children:children})});};export default Section;
